name: Hat Box Adventure
description:
Hat Box Adventure (Or, formerly named:  "Cube Game") is just a fun, little, 3D platformer game with some simple enemies, a couple story elements I have yet to implement into the gameplay, a handful of pretty terrible puns, and a TON of chaos and bugs which may or may not have been intentional... if this sort of a game interests you, please feel free to test it out, for yourself!

Or don't. I mean... it's up to you, really. I guess you could just, like... be bored, instead? That's an option too, I suppose.
